name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The ultimate iPhone with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and the most advanced Pro camera system ever. Features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology.

name: MacBook Air 15-inch M3
description: Supercharged by the M3 chip, the 15-inch MacBook Air delivers incredible performance in an impossibly thin and light design. Perfect for productivity and creativity.

name: AirPods Pro (2nd generation)
description: AirPods Pro feature up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes and the perfect amount of flash.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: The original blue jean since 1873. With a classic straight leg and iconic styling, they're literally the blueprint for every pair of jeans in existence.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer
description: The KitchenAid Artisan Series 5-Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer is perfect for heavy mixtures and kneading bread dough. Includes flat beater, dough hook, and wire whisk.

name: Wilson Pro Staff Tennis Racket
description: The Wilson Pro Staff v13 delivers the precision and feel that advanced players demand. Features Braided Graphite construction for enhanced stability and control.

name: Samsung 55" 4K QLED Smart TV
description: Experience brilliant picture quality with Quantum Dot technology. Features AI-powered 4K upscaling, HDR10+, and built-in smart TV platform with voice control.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
description: Dyson's most powerful, intelligent cordless vacuum. Features laser dust detection, advanced filtration, and up to 60 minutes of run time.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23 Running Shoes
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 23 features responsive BOOST midsole cushioning and a Primeknit+ upper for ultimate comfort during your runs.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with crystal-clear hands-free calling. 30-hour battery life and quick charge capability.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
description: 7 appliances in 1: pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, yogurt maker, steamer, sauté pan, and food warmer.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic Sunglasses
description: The original Ray-Ban Aviator with crystal lenses and a timeless gold frame. UV protection and iconic style.

name: Patagonia Houdini Jacket
description: Ultra-lightweight windbreaker made from 100% recycled nylon. Packs into its own pocket and weighs just 3 oz.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: Nintendo Switch with a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and a wide adjustable stand for tabletop gaming.

name: Yeti Rambler 20 oz Tumbler
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel tumbler keeps drinks cold for 24+ hours. Dishwasher safe with MagSlider Lid.

name: Anthropologie Gleaming Primrose Mirror
description: Sunburst wall mirror with antique brass finish. Perfect statement piece for any room with vintage charm.

name: Allbirds Tree Runners
description: Comfortable everyday sneakers made from eucalyptus tree fiber. Machine washable and carbon neutral shipping.

name: Vitamix 5200 Blender
description: Professional-grade blender with 2-peak horsepower motor. Self-cleaning and comes with a 64-oz container.

name: Peloton Bike Shoes
description: Cycling shoes designed for Peloton bikes with LOOK Delta cleats. Breathable mesh upper with secure strap closure.

name: Carhartt Insulated Work Gloves
description: Durable work gloves with synthetic leather palm and 3M Thinsulate insulation for cold weather protection.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (11th Generation)
description: 6.8" display with adjustable warm light, waterproof design, and weeks of battery life. 8GB storage.

name: West Elm Mid-Century Dining Table
description: Solid walnut dining table with tapered legs and natural wood grain. Seats 6 comfortably.

name: Hydro Flask Standard Mouth Water Bottle
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel water bottle. Keeps cold drinks cold for 24 hours.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II Camera Body
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, 4K 60p video recording, and advanced autofocus system.

name: Lululemon Align High-Rise Pant 28"
description: Ultra-soft Nulu fabric leggings designed for yoga and low-impact workouts. Four-way stretch and sweat-wicking.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds
description: World-class noise cancellation in wireless earbuds. 6-hour battery plus 12 hours with charging case.

name: Lodge Cast Iron Dutch Oven
description: Pre-seasoned cast iron Dutch oven perfect for braising, baking, and roasting. Dual loop handles for easy lifting.

name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket
description: Classic fleece jacket made from recycled polyester. Full-zip design with stand-up collar and zippered pockets.

name: Fitbit Versa 4 Fitness Smartwatch
description: Health and fitness focused smartwatch with 6+ day battery life, built-in GPS, and 40+ exercise modes.

name: Coleman Sundome 4-Person Tent
description: Spacious dome tent with WeatherTec system to keep you dry. Easy setup in 10 minutes with color-coded poles.

name: Anthropologie Capri Blue Volcano Candle
description: Signature scented candle with tropical blend of citrus and sugared oranges. Burns for 85+ hours.

name: Birkenstock Arizona Soft Footbed Sandals
description: Classic two-strap sandal with contoured cork footbed and soft suede lining. Adjustable metal buckles.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black Action Camera
description: Waterproof action camera with 5.3K video recording, HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization, and front + rear screens.

name: Theragun Elite Percussive Therapy Device
description: Professional-grade massage device with customizable speed range and smartphone app connectivity. 120-minute battery.

name: Crate & Barrel Lounge II Apartment Sofa
description: Modern sectional sofa with deep, plush cushions and durable performance fabric. Perfect for smaller spaces.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee Maker
description: Single-serve coffee maker with one-touch brewing. Uses Centrifusion technology for rich crema extraction.

name: Champion Powerblend Fleece Hoodie
description: Classic pullover hoodie with soft fleece lining. Features kangaroo pocket and adjustable drawstring hood.

name: iRobot Roomba j7+ Robot Vacuum
description: Smart robot vacuum with obstacle avoidance, automatic dirt disposal, and pet waste guarantee. WiFi connected.

name: Oakley Holbrook Sunglasses
description: Classic American frame design inspired by the screen heroes of the 1940s, 50s, and 60s. Plutonite lens material.

name: REI Co-op Merino Wool Long Underwear Set
description: Base layer set made from responsibly sourced merino wool. Natural odor resistance and temperature regulation.

name: Staub Cast Iron Round Cocotte
description: Enameled cast iron Dutch oven with self-basting spikes on lid. Perfect for braising, roasting, and baking.

name: Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones with Pure Adaptive Noise Cancelling and Apple W1 chip. Up to 22 hours of battery life.

name: Osprey Atmos AG 65 Backpack
description: Backpacking pack with Anti-Gravity suspension system. Includes integrated raincover and multiple access points.

name: Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Stockpot
description: Colorful enameled cast iron stockpot perfect for soups, stews, and pasta. Chip-resistant exterior enamel.

name: Garmin Forerunner 945 GPS Running Watch
description: Premium GPS running smartwatch with advanced training metrics, music storage, and up to 2 weeks battery life.

name: Anthropologie Gleaming Primrose Mirror
description: Sunburst wall mirror with antique brass finish. Perfect statement piece for any room with vintage charm.

name: Madewell Perfect Vintage Jean
description: Classic straight-leg jeans with a vintage-inspired fit. Made from premium denim with just the right amount of stretch.

name: Weber Genesis II E-310 Gas Grill
description: 3-burner propane gas grill with porcelain-enameled cooking grates and Flavorizer Bars for authentic barbecue flavor.

name: Allbirds Tree Dasher 2
description: Performance running shoe made with eucalyptus tree fiber upper and SweetFoam midsole from sugarcane.
